title: WellPlanningWellbore
description: A hole in the ground extending from a point at the earth's surface to the maximum point of penetration.

WellPlanningWellID.title: Well Planning Well ID
WellPlanningWellID.description: Identifier of the parent well side-car for the well planning domain.

SurveyProgramIDs.title: Survey Program IDs
SurveyProgramIDs.description: A reference to the objects that holds the information about the definitive version of the different survey programs associated with the wellbore

TargetID.title: Target ID
TargetID.description: The drill targets associated with this definitive Drilling Program

WellboreMarkerSetID.title: Wellbore MarkerSet ID
WellboreMarkerSetID.description: The formation markers associated with the definitive Drilling Program

PlannedLithologyID.title: Planned Lithology ID
PlannedLithologyID.description: A reference to the descriptive object that holds the information about the planned lithology associated with the wellbore

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section ID
HoleSectionID.description: The definitive description of the hole section associated with this wellbore

PPFGDatasetID.title: PPFG Dataset ID
PPFGDatasetID.description: A reference to the PPFGDataset that holds the information about the pore pressure associated with the definitive drilling program

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of Well Planning wellbore. Derived from the record identified by WellboreID.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement
VerticalMeasurement.description: The zero depth point (ZDP) definition for the all measured depths related to this WellPlanningWellbore.
